timeline.bodyText: why would the managed server be stopped? When the replicaCount is 1 how does changing the serverStartPolicy from ALWAYS to IF_NEEDED shutsdown the server? There is only one running server in this cluster right?
timeline.author: sankarpn

replies.bodyText:
ALWAYS for managed server just start the managed server irrespective of replica count. You may go beyond the replica count. IF_NEEDED means it starts if we need to fulfill the replica count.
Ref : https://oracle.github.io/weblogic-kubernetes-operator/userguide/managing-domains/domain-lifecycle/startup/
